text: The List of Leeds United A.F.C. players is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Leeds United A.F.C.AFC is an acronym. AFC stands for "Association Football Club". The team is also known by the acronym LUFC which stands for "Leeds United Footbal Club". is an English football club in Leeds, West Yorkshire.Soccerway.com, Leeds United AFC; retrieved 2012-7-16. ==List== :This list is not finished; you can help Wikipedia by adding to it. ===2011 team=== There were 30+ men on the 2010-2011 team,Soccerway.com, Leeds United AFC Squad; retrieved 2012-7-16. including *Adam ClaytonSoccerway.com, A. Clayton"; "List of Players, 2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup" ; retrieved 2012-7-16. * Kasper SchmeichelSoccerway.com, "K. Schmeichel"; retrieved 2012-7-16. ===2012 team=== There were 30+ men on the 2011-2012 team. Only some of the names were the same as the 2011 season. † † † † † (Note) † Symbol - Indicates the player is currently 'Transfer Listed' by the club. ==Related pages == * Football League Championship == References == ==Other websites== * Leeds United website Category:Lists of footballers football Category:England football-related lists
